entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Elliot Lake
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
